Wide and Tall Content

This content is wider than the container and also has significant height.

function visualRegressionTest() { const elements = document.querySelectorAll('*'); const results = []; for (const element of elements) { const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect(); const styles = window.getComputedStyle(element); results.push({ tagName: element.tagName, position: { x: rect.x, y: rect.y }, dimensions: { width: rect.width, height: rect.height }, overflow: styles.overflow, display: styles.display }); } return results; }
